buttonsGenerateRulesTT.message: Create new or update existing rules

moveRuleTT.message: Move this rule to another profile

optionsExceptionsIntro.message: There may be pages you don't want Autofill activated on. Enter any part of the document title or URL of these pages below, with one entry on each line. Regular Expressions are supported.

optionsFieldsNameColHelp.message: Text label, 'name', or 'id' of the field to autofill.

optionsFieldsNameColTooltip.message:
• Regular Expressions are supported.
  • Everything between /* and */ is ignored.
  • Partial match is accepted.
  • Match is case insensitive.

optionsFieldsOverwriteInputTT.message: Check this box if you want Autofill to overwrite fields that already contain text

optionsFieldsSelectProfile.message: Select a profile to move this autofill rule to.

optionsFieldsSiteColHelp.message: Document title or URL required to trigger autofill.

optionsFieldsSiteColTooltip.message:
• Regular Expressions are supported.
  • Put multiple filters on separate lines (or use "|").
  • Partial match is accepted.
  • Match is case insensitive.

optionsFieldsValueColHelp.message: Text to autofill or command to auto-select/check.

optionsFieldsValueColTooltip.message:
• If Type = Select, enter the menu item's text or index number to auto-select. For listboxes, enter a space-separated list of index numbers, "!" to select all, or leave blank to unselect all. Enter "?" to randomly select an item.
  • If Type = Checkbox/Radio, enter 1 to check or 0 to uncheck for each item in the group. Add "!" at the end to check/uncheck all items. Enter "?" to randomly toggle.
  • If Type = JavaScript, enter JavaScript code. It will be evaluated last.

optionsOtherBackup.message: B<u>a</u>ck up text fields larger than:

optionsOtherBackupCharsInputTT.message: Set the minimum number of characters to back up

optionsOtherBackupHelp.message: Check this box to automatically save text fields in case Chrome crashes.

optionsOtherDebugHelp.message: Check this box to show debugging messages in the Chrome console.

optionsOtherDelayHelp.message: Check this box to add a delay before Autofill rules are executed.

optionsOtherDelaySecInputTT.message: Set the number of seconds to wait before autofilling

optionsOtherImportExportIntro.message: To import settings into Autofill, paste the CSV data into the box below and click Import. To export the current settings to an external file, click Export, copy the generated CSV data, paste it into a text editor, and save the file with extension .csv.

optionsOtherLabelMatchHelp.message: Uncheck this box if you want to disable the fuzzy text label matching.

optionsOtherManualHelp.message: Check this box to trigger Autofill only when you select a profile.

optionsOtherMaskHelp.message: If this box is checked, passwords in the Value column will be hidden from view.

optionsOtherMenuHelp.message: Uncheck this box if you want to remove Autofill from the right-click context menu.

optionsOtherOverwriteHelp.message: If this box is checked, the "Overwrite non-empty fields" option will be enabled by default.

optionsOtherScaleHelp.message: If this box is checked, the rules table will scale to the window height to reduce scrolling.

optionsOtherSoundHelp.message: Check this box if you want to hear sound effects after every autofill operation.

optionsOtherVarsHelp.message: If this box is checked, <tt>{…}</tt> will be replaced with the variable's output. Click on Help for more info.

optionsOtherVoiceHelp.message: Check this box if you want the Wizard to speak after creating autofill rules.

optionsSupportKeyboardShortcutsTT.message: Go here to see the available keyboard shortcuts

optionsSupportOnlineHelpTT.message: Go here to read the complete documentation

optionsSupportPracticeFormTT.message: Go here to practice creating your autofill rules

optionsSupportSupportForumTT.message: Go here to report issues or share your feature suggestions

optionsTabsExceptionsTT.message: Pages or sites to exclude from Autofill

optionsTabsOtherTT.message: Other stuff to brighten your day

optionsTabsSiteInputTT.message: Enter any part of the <title> or URL that needs to match in order to trigger rules in this profile

statusCharLimit.message: Profile name cannot be over 30 characters.

statusEnterValue.message: Enter a value for the highlighted field.

statusImportFailed.message: Import failed – see Help for correct CSV format.

statusNotSavedStorageLimit.message: Cannot add rules – 5MB storage limit reached.

statusPageStillLoading.message: The page is still loading. Please try again in a few seconds.

statusProfileCharLimit.message: Profile name cannot be over 30 characters.

statusReserved.message: This profile name cannot be used.

statusSaveFailed.message: Save failed – you have reached the 5MB storage limit.

statusSettingsExported.message: Settings exported. Copy data and save in a CSV file.

statusSettingsImported.message: Settings imported. Review rules in Form Fields tab. Click Save to commit changes.
